quote_first: “No, sir, only the housekeeper. He’s been in New England visiting his daughter. He always goes there in the fall. He was due back at the Heathrow on BA flight 214 arriving at
title: A Taste for Death
author: P.D. James

quote_first: He tried one more time at
quote_last:
, and nothing had changed. It ran and ran, eleven, twelve, thirteen times.
He threw his guitar in his dad’s car and drove south toward Prescott. The Built to Spill tape was still in the tape deck, and he just let it keep going; it might as well be the damn soundtrack to everything.
title: Kitchens of the Great Midwest
author: J. Ryan Stradal

title: The Evening's at Seven
author: James Thurber
